api_key.title: Rachio API Key
api_key.description: Rachio API key, visit https://rachio.readme.io/docs/authentication for help.

device_id.title: Rachio Controller Device ID
device_id.description: Device ID of the Rachio Controller to use. Only necessary if you have more than one controller linked to your account and want to connect only one to HomeKit. Entering a Device ID here will ignore all other controllers linked to your account.

default_runtime.title: Default Runtime in Minutes
default_runtime.description: Default number of minutes to run zone if not provided

use_irrigation_display.title: Display as Irrigation System in HomeKit
use_irrigation_display.description: Display accessory in HomeKit as a irrigation system with sprinker zones. If unchecked; zones will display as single/separate tiles.

show_standby.title: Expose switch for controller standby
show_standby.description: Exposes standby mode switch, when turned on all schedules will be disabled

show_runall.title: All zones
show_runall.description: Adds a switch to run all zones for the default time

show_schedules.title: Expose switches for schedules
show_schedules.description: Exposes schedules as defined in the Rachio app as a switch for quick run

external_IP_address.title: External IP Address
external_IP_address.description: External IP address for this server, used to receive webhook requests. To find this quick try https://www.myexternalip.com .

external_webhook_port.title: External Webhook Port
external_webhook_port.description: External port or source for receiving webhook requests. Your router will need to forward this port to your internal webhook port.

internal_webhook_port.title: Internal Webhook Port
internal_webhook_port.description: Internal port or destination for receiving webhook requests.

delete_webhooks.title: Delete current webhook IDs
delete_webhooks.description: Use this if there is a need to delete current webhook IDs that may be causing problems. Such as errors for 'Webhook received from an unknown external id`
